skillTree.localised_description: This proud and noble Unicorn elevates the Enchantress above her host, so all may see and be strengthened by her blessed presence.

effects.description: Mount: Silvaron

attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: No one is more accomplished in the Lore of Life than the Fay Enchantress.

effects.description: Cooldown: -25% to Lore of Life spells

skillTree.localised_description: Whether a former Wizard who displeased the Enchantress or merely a toad, this magic-imbued amphibian strengthens her spells whilst weakening those of her opponents.

backgroundSkills.localised_description:
"When the clarion call is sounded
	 I will ride out and fight in the name of Liege and Lady
	Whilst I draw breath the lands bequeathed
	 unto me will remain untainted by evil
	 Honour is all, Chivalry is all..."

"I set down my lance, symbol of duty
	I spurn those whom I love
	I relinquish all and take up the tools of my quest
	No obstacle will stand before me
	No plea for help shall find me waiting
	No moon will look upon me twice lest I be judged idle
	I give my body, heart and soul to the Lady whom I seek..."

"That which is sacrosanct I shall preserve
	 That which is sublime I will protect
	That which threatens I will destroy
	For my holy wrath will know no bounds..."

effects.description: Spell: "Harmonic Convergence"
Spell: "Wind Blast"

target_if: Grounded
Not on or below a platform
